original_text: Then the widow went home. She did what Elijah had told her to do. After that, there was enough food every day for Elijah and for the widow and her family.
korean_text: 그가 가서 엘리야의 말대로 하였더니 그와 엘리야와 그의 식구가 여러 날 먹었으나

sentences.original_text: She did what Elijah had told her to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 엘리야가 그녀에게 하라고 한 것을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: After that, there was enough food every day
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 매일 충분한 음식이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: for Elijah and for the widow and her family.
